output_questions.question: Yellow background
output_questions.explanation: The div's background is yellow using `background-color`.

output_questions.question:
<style>
body {
  background-image: url('bg.png');
}
</style>
<body>With image</body>
output_questions.explanation: The page uses 'bg.png' as its background image.

output_questions.question: Patterned
output_questions.explanation: The pattern image is shown once (not tiled) in the div's background.

output_questions.question:
<style>
section {
  background-position: right top;
  background-image: url('corner.png');
}
</style>
<section>Corner image</section>
output_questions.output: <section style="background-position: right top; background-image: url('corner.png');">Corner image</section>
output_questions.explanation: The background image is positioned in the top-right corner.

output_questions.question: Cover
output_questions.explanation: The background image covers the entire box area, possibly cropping the image.

output_questions.question: Dotted
output_questions.explanation: Gray background with a horizontally repeating dotted image.

output_questions.question:
<style>
body {
  background-attachment: fixed;
  background-image: url('fixed.jpg');
}
</style>
<body>Fixed BG</body>
output_questions.explanation: The background image stays fixed while scrolling.

output_questions.question: Gradient
output_questions.explanation: A linear gradient background from red (left) to yellow (right).

output_questions.question: Rounded repeat
output_questions.explanation: The image is repeated and scaled to fit the div's width and height.

output_questions.question: Centered image
output_questions.output: Centered image
output_questions.explanation: The background image is centered within the element.

output_questions.question:
<style>
section {
  background-size: 50px 100px;
  background-image: url('sized.png');
}
</style>
<section>Sized BG</section>
output_questions.explanation: The background image is stretched to 50x100 pixels.

output_questions.question: Repeating gradient
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph has a repeating diagonal striped background.

output_questions.question: Clear background
output_questions.explanation: No background is applied, even if inherited.

output_questions.question: Radial Gradient
output_questions.output: Radial Gradient
output_questions.explanation: A blue-to-white radial gradient is used as the background.

output_questions.question:
<style>
body {
  background-color: #222;
  color: #fff;
}
</style>
<body>Dark mode</body>
output_questions.explanation: The page uses a dark background with white text.
